column4: 6 months after 1.5 was released before we could label the program firefox
because our binaries weren't working exactly like theirs
I'm not sure ask jory pratt if you can find him
he was the maintainer at the time
but you can't modify the firefox binary in almost any way including patches and keep the trademark
wonders if reiser4 will ever make it into the kernel now
i bet even if he is inocent .. it wont
i dont trust ubuntu updates. since everytime i update.. it breaks my box
well not EVERYtime. but alot.. enough that i dont update for at least 1 month at a time
then re create your broked account
just recreate the account and move your personal data back over
